snippet: The Ford Motor Company will start selling an electricity-powered Ranger pickup truck for $30,000 in 1998 in California, the company said on Monday.   The vehicle has a range of about 58 miles in urban driving, said John Wallace, director of the au...
lead_paragraph: The Ford Motor Company will start selling an electricity-powered Ranger pickup truck for $30,000 in 1998 in California, the company said on Monday. The vehicle has a range of about 58 miles in urban driving, said John Wallace, director of the auto maker's electric vehicle program.

headline.main: Ford Electric Truck Set for California
